Text: another quality release from omega...thanks alot good movie
Unfortunately no extras on this one. Thanks for the upload anyway.
the only extras this had were trailers. i don't think there are any regular dvd versions with the extras you're looking for. if you want any other extras you'll have to get the blu-ray version.

there is a 2 disc special edition dvd released...with the 2nd disc being the digital copy, and extras on the first disc. 
http://www.dvdtown.com/moviedatabase/release-details/body-of-lies/dvd/25341

but probably will just buy it for the extras.
Thanks again though!
wow, i didn't know they actually had a special edition available on standard dvd! it must not be very common around here. sorry, i couldn't help you and you're welcome.
